title: Fort Vorta Bella update thread
content:
I added a new download to my website: strips of nearly every single commander keen enemy called KeenMonsters.ZIP.

I also have a better banner, brought to you by Kittyorp/Kat/etc (My cousin). (She was on here by the name of Kittyorp.

Enjoy!

[url=http://www.geocities.com/globox88/index.html]www.geocities.com/globox88/index.html[/url]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

title: hmm
content:

So, do whatever you like with it.
